results.title: Gymnastics: Just about the best thing going
results.creator_credit: Frank Heimans, Peter Johnson, Cinetel Productions and Film Australia
results.brief_description: A film celebration of the sport of gymnastics. Australian young people, aged seven to fifteen, and others praise the activity as beneficial therapy for poor coordination, improvement of physical fitness, increasing self-confidence and making new friends. They also tell of the necessary discipline and hard work.
results.title_for_label: Gymnastics: Just about the best thing going
results.creator_credit_for_label: Frank Heimans, Peter Johnson, Cinetel Productions and Film Australia

results.title: Gymnastics! Fundamentals and techniques. Pt. 2
results.brief_description: Illustrates fundamentals and techniques through the use of close-up, slow motion and regular photography. Includes a complex Free Exercise routine; still and swinging ring events; routines on the side horse; and a horizontal or high bar series includes the fly-away, twist, giant swing, backward giant and hip turn.

results.title: Gymnastics! Fundamentals and techniques. Pt. 1
results.brief_description: Illustrates fundamentals and techniques through the use of close-ups, slow-motion and regular photography. Includes demonstrations on parallel bars, of standard turns, rolls, and stands; rope-climbing; use of the long-horse in vaulting exercises; and tumbling fundamentals such as rolls, handstands, cartwheels, Hecht, somersaults and handsprings.
results.description: Illustrates fundamentals and techniques through the use of close-ups, slow-motion and regular photography. results.title: Guy
results.creator_credit: Peter Schnitzler, Gary Schlosser and Extension Medical Centre
results.brief_description: The story of Guy, a Chicano teenager , his problems with school, rugs, police and racism. Through his story the problems of the whole society are illustrated.

results.title: Gurdeep Singh Bains
results.creator_credit: Beverly Shaffer, Kathleen Shannon, Yuki Yoshida and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: Gurdeep is a thirteen-year-old Canadian Sikh whose family runs a dairy farm in the southern coastal plain of British Columbia. They have retained their language and religion. Attendance at the Sikh temple, playing soccer with his schoolmates and working on the farm are all part of Gurdeep’s life but sometimes he feels different from other children, because he wears a turban.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Beverly Shaffer, Kathleen Shannon, Yuki Yoshida and ONF | NFB

results.title: Guns for life
results.creator_credit: Jeff Howard, Alberta Native Communications Society and ONF | NFB
results.brief_description: As we follow the Native Americans on a hunting trip, the film explores how gun laws are designed to prevent people who may be criminals or irresponsible, from owning a gun. Also covered are safety regulations for those who do have a certificate to won a gun, and the consequences if these are ignored.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Howard, Alberta Native Communications Society and ONF | NFB

results.title: Guns and roses
results.creator_credit: Carole Sklan, Helen Bowman, John Moore and Open Channel Productions
results.brief_description: After enduring years of constant physical and psychological abuse, Melody shot and killed her husband. This film examines the criminal justice system and the conspiracy of silence surrounding domestic violence, through interviews with Melody, her sister, her lawyer, a psychologist specialising in the effects of domestic violence and the supreme court judge who heard her case. Included is an interview with Phil Cleary, M.P. for Wills whose sister was killed by her partner.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Carole Sklan, Helen Bowman, John Moore and Open Channel Productions

results.title: Gumby : funday
results.brief_description: Gumby, the worlds favourite clayboy invites you to join him and his friends Pokey the Horse, Prickle the dinosaur, and Goo the Blue Mermaid as they share eight fabulous new adventures: The Elephant and the dragon ; Denalis house ; Ostrich feathers ; B.D. Party in the Middle Ages ; The Big city ; Of note ; Humbug ; Fun day.
